title: AI used to predict the toll of concussions on student athletes over time
description: Researchers at the University of Michigan are using artificial intelligence to predict the health consequences that sport-related concussions might have on student athletes over the course of their college athletic careers.
content:

title: Global equity funds log weekly inflows as AI optimism, Fed cut bets boost sentiment
description: Global equity funds recorded net inflows for the first time in three weeks in the week to September 24, as optimism around artificial intelligence investments and renewed bets on potential U.S. rate cuts lifted investor sentiment.
content: Sept 26 (Reuters) - Global equity funds recorded net inflows for the first time in three weeks in the week to September 24, as optimism around artificial intelligence investments and renewed bets on potential U.S. rate cuts lifted investor sentiment.... [1762 chars]

title: What Queen's University's GIFT City Campus Offers Indian Students: Dean Explains
description: Queen's University's GIFT City Campus: It will initially offer 500 seats in five Master's programmes from January 2026, with two additional courses planned for September 2026, including MSc in Artificial Intelligence and MSc AI for Business.
content: In a first, one of the oldest universities in the UK, Queen's University, has established an offshore campus in India at the Gujarat International Finance-Tec (GIFT) City. The GIFT City campus is reportedly the largest in the smart city, spanning 145... [2778 chars]

title: AI Cloud Firm Northern Data Raided by German Investigators

title: AI platform compiles data on Spain’s renewable energy projects
description: Orka Energía has unveiled an artificial intelligence platform that compiles and updates data on more than 4,000 renewable energy projects under development in Spain, including capacity, status, substations, and developers.
